meanings.sent1: The doctor confirmed that the patient's injuries were nonfatal.
meanings.sent2: Thankfully, the car accident was nonfatal for everyone involved.
meanings.sent3: The nonfatal bee sting left a red mark on my arm.
meanings.sent4: Her nonfatal mistake in the game cost her the victory.
meanings.sent5: The nonfatal fall from the tree left him with only a few bruises.

meanings.sent1: The nonfatal dose of medicine helped improve his condition.
meanings.sent2: The nonfatal gunshot wound required immediate medical attention.
meanings.sent3: His nonfatal fall down the stairs was quite embarrassing.
meanings.sent4: The nonfatal error in the report led to some confusion.
meanings.sent5: The nonfatal lightning strike hit the tree instead of the house.
